aikin trigonometric: Ayyukan kusurwa da aka bayyana azaman rabo na tsawon bangarorin triangle mai kusurwa dama
inverse aiki: Aikin da aka samu ta hanyar bayyana madaidaicin madaidaicin aiki ɗaya azaman madaidaicin madaidaicin wani
coscent: Matsakaicin aikin sine, wanda aka ayyana azaman rabon hypotenuse zuwa kishiyar gefen triangle mai kusurwa dama.
mai cutarwa: Matsakaicin aikin tangent, wanda aka bayyana azaman rabon kusa da kishiyar gefen triangle mai kusurwa dama.
ainihin trigonometric: Daidaiton da ya ƙunshi ayyukan trigonometric wanda yake gaskiya ga duk ƙimar masu canji
dokokin sines: A cikin triangle, rabon tsayin gefe zuwa gefen kusurwar kishiyarsa yana dawwama
dokokin cosines: A cikin murabba'in murabba'i, murabba'in gefe yana daidai da jimlar murabba'in sauran ɓangarorin biyu ban da sau biyu samfurin waɗannan ɓangarorin biyu da ƙashin kusurwar da aka haɗa.
ma'aunin radiyo: Ma'aunin kusurwa a cikin radiyo, wanda shine rabon tsayin baka zuwa radius
saurin kusurwa: Adadin canjin kwana dangane da lokaci
tsayin baka: Nisa tsakanin maki biyu tare da wani sashe na lanƙwasa
sashen: Bangaren da'irar da radiyo biyu ke kewaye da baka da aka katse su
trigonometric rabo: Matsakaicin tsayin bangarorin biyu na triangle dama
ma'aunin trigonometric: Ma'auni mai haɗaka ɗaya ko da yawa ayyukan trigonometric na ma'auni
